name: "MATRIX PIECE". SPECIAL EDITION.
description:
Special piece for all collectors who have the complete collection of the "7 Deadly Sins" .

The block chain became stronger. It is time to observe reality through our senses; 
to look for light in its reflections; to close our eyes, to travel within yourself, 
and to find the answer your own being is requiring. From oneself to the world, from your inside and forevermore.

Naranja Brasa leads us to an encrypted world where reality can only be observed through our senses. 
In this story, many lives merge. Actually, everyone's lives; but one in particular: yours. 
That is why, when we begin to redirect our thoughts, our own vision on how we live is immediately transformed. 
We welcome you to experience a now possible and new scenario, and with it, a whole new conscience awakening.
